channel.title: Tmux on Dash
channel.description: Recent content in Tmux on Dash

item.title: tmux tips
item.description: Following is my tmux cheet sheet, it will be updated from time to time. Create a new tmux session: $ tmux new Given session name: $ tmux new -s session-name Detach: ctrl + b, ’d`. List existing session: $ tmux ls Attached to existing session: $ tmux a -t session-name Attached to first session: $ tmux a
